comment.author: 17962436@N00
comment._content: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9800E3D81E31E233A... CAMBRIDGE, Mass., Dec. 19. -- The football players who participated in Harvard's game against Yale in the stadium this Fall will hold their election of a Captain for 1912 to-morrow. Only twelve men will attend the meeting, as L.D. Smith is away, and "Doc" Leslie only yesterday had an operation for appendicitis. Roth [sic] men have finished their football careers at Harvard.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Percy Langdon Wendell. See www.archive.org/stream/bookathletics00with#page/112/mode/2up for an article he wrote, with more football pictures of the period. Probably: Percy Langdon Wendell, born 1889, died 1932 as indicated at www.starsend.net/bryants/gsbdetail10.html and en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Percy_Wendell

kostia and swanq:

Thanks for the information on Mr. Wendell. We will expand the descriptive information for this photograph when we update.
